sn48.53:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kosambiyam viharati ghositarame.
sn48.53:1.4: “atthi nu kho, bhikkhave, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma sekho bhikkhu sekhabhumiyam thito ‘sekhosmi’ti pajaneyya, asekho bhikkhu asekhabhumiyam thito ‘asekhosmi’ti pajaneyya”ti?
sn48.53:2.2: “atthi, bhikkhave, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma sekho bhikkhu sekhabhumiyam thito ‘sekhosmi’ti pajaneyya, asekho bhikkhu asekhabhumiyam thito ‘asekhosmi’ti pajaneyya.
sn48.53:3.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma sekho bhikkhu sekhabhumiyam thito ‘sekhosmi’ti pajanati?
sn48.53:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati—
sn48.53:3.3: ayampi kho, bhikkhave, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma sekho bhikkhu sekhabhumiyam thito ‘sekhosmi’ti pajanati.
sn48.53:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu iti patisancikkhati:
sn48.53:4.2: ‘atthi nu kho ito bahiddha anno samano va brahmano va yo evam bhutam taccham tatham dhammam deseti yatha bhagava’ti?
sn48.53:4.4: ‘natthi kho ito bahiddha anno samano va brahmano va yo evam bhutam taccham tatham dhammam deseti yatha bhagava’ti.
sn48.53:4.5: Ayampi kho, bhikkhave, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma sekho bhikkhu sekhabhumiyam thito ‘sekhosmi’ti pajanati.
sn48.53:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu pancindriyani pajanati—
sn48.53:5.3: Yangatikani yamparamani yamphalani yampariyosanani. Na heva kho kayena phusitva viharati;
sn48.53:5.5: Ayampi kho, bhikkhave, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma sekho bhikkhu sekhabhumiyam thito ‘sekhosmi’ti pajanati.
sn48.53:6.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma asekho bhikkhu asekhabhumiyam thito ‘asekhosmi’ti pajanati?
sn48.53:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, asekho bhikkhu pancindriyani pajanati—
sn48.53:6.4: Yangatikani yamparamani yamphalani yampariyosanani. Kayena ca phusitva viharati;
sn48.53:6.6: Ayampi kho, bhikkhave, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma asekho bhikkhu asekhabhumiyam thito ‘asekhosmi’ti pajanati.
sn48.53:7.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, asekho bhikkhu cha indriyani pajanati.
sn48.53:7.3: imani kho cha indriyani sabbena sabbam sabbatha sabbam aparisesam nirujjhissanti, annani ca cha indriyani na kuhinci kisminci uppajjissanti’ti pajanati.
sn48.53:7.4: Ayampi kho, bhikkhave, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma asekho bhikkhu asekhabhumiyam thito ‘asekhosmi’ti pajanati”ti.
